Come visit us!

@ Woermann Fresh Supermarkets

Grab 'n Go | Deli | Bistro

Enjoy a coffee, breakfast or lunch at our harvest table, build your pizza or crispy Brötchen, Mediterranean salads or hearty cooked meals at our Deli or at the grab and go if you are in a hurry.

Opening Hours

Monday - Saturday : 7h00 - 19h00
Sunday : 8h00 - 19h00
